title: Google & Meta Ads Manager (Full-Time)
job_overview:
OVERVIEW:
True Wellness Marketing is hiring a full-time Ads Manager to run and optimize Google and Meta ad campaigns for our clients — functional medicine and concierge medical practices across the U.S. We’re a mission-driven agency that helps health providers grow their practices through results-focused, ethical digital marketing.

If you’re data-driven, strategic, and ready to grow with a tight-knit team doing meaningful work, we want to hear from you.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Launch, manage, and optimize ad campaigns on Google Search, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), and retargeting
-Write ad copy and test creatives (with support from copy/design)
- Set up conversion tracking, pixels, tags, and UTMs
- Monitor CPL, CTR, ROAS; adjust budgets, bids, and audiences
- Track and report performance weekly
- Suggest CRO/funnel improvements to increase conversions
- Collaborate with team via Upgrade to see actual info and ClickUp
- Be available for occasional U.S.-hour meetings (team/client)

REQUIREMENTS:
- 2+ years experience with Google Ads + Meta Ads
-Fluent in English (written and spoken)
- Proficiency with Google Ads Manager, Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics/GA4, Google Tag Manager
- Familiar with lead generation strategy and optimization
- Organized, results-focused, and proactive communicator
- Bonus: Experience with GoHighLevel or functional medicine

TOOLS WE USE:
- Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager
- Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager
- GoHighLevel (CRM/funnels)
- ClickUp (project management)
- Upgrade to see actual info (team communication)
- Google Workspace, Loom

COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:
- $800–$1,200/month USD
- Performance-based bonuses
- Paid U.S. or PH holidays
- Long-term opportunity with growth path

TO APPLY, PLEASE SUBMIT:
1. Updated resume
2. DISC assessment (free version is fine — send results link)
3. Short video (2–3 minutes) introducing yourself. Include:
-- Why you’re a great fit?
-- Why you want to work with True Wellness Marketing?
-- A campaign you’re proud of (goals/results)
-- How you handle underperforming campaigns
4. (Optional but preferred) A portfolio or Loom/video walkthrough of 1–2 successful ad campaigns

ABOUT US:
True Wellness Marketing helps functional medicine and concierge clinics attract more of the right patients through full-service digital marketing. We are values-driven, strategy-first, and committed to helping our clients grow practices that change lives.
